name: Batter Out Of Bullet Hell
description:
You're a small Demon filled with RAGE, out to kill GOD. You have a bat and a dream. Defeat the 3 bosses in this boss rush/bullet hell game.

wasd to move
shift to dash
esc to go back to the main menu

Art is all made by me. The main character sprite is however heavily inspired and referencing 0x72 style of sprites, 

Free Assets Used

Fonts:

Dungeon Font by vrtxrry

Arcade by Void

Music:

Music Loop Bundle by Tallbeard
